hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
rm -rf ./* homedir=/home/test #Install dependencies sudo zypper install -y gcc gcc-c++ make ncurses patch wget tar bzip2 zlib-devel xz readline-devel wget-openssl1 curl-openssl1 sqlite-devel tk-devel libopenssl-devel ncurses-devel gdbm-devel openssl openssl-devel libdb-4_5-devel gdb awk glibc-debuginfo netcfg libbz2-devel awk netcfg libtool automake autoconf
#Create symlinks sudo ln -sfv /usr/include/ncurses/* /usr/include/
#Build openssl cd $homedir sudo rm -rf openssl git clone git://github.com/openssl/openssl.git cd openssl git checkout OpenSSL_1_0_2l ./config --prefix=/usr --openssldir=/usr/local/openssl shared make sudo make install openssl version
export PATH=/usr/local/bin:$PATH #export LDFLAGS="-L/usr/local/lib/" #export LD_LIBRARY_PATH="/usr/local/lib/" #export CPPFLAGS="-I/usr/local/include -I/usr/local/include/openssl" cat /etc/services
#Build curl cd $homedir sudo rm -rf curl git clone git://github.com/curl/curl.git cd curl git checkout curl-7_52_1 ./buildconf ./configure --prefix=/usr/local --with-ssl --disable-shared make && sudo make install
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:/usr/local/lib64 export PATH=/usr/local/bin:$PATH
#Generate ca-bundle.crt for curl
echo insecure >> $HOME/.curlrc wget --no-check-certificate https://raw.githubusercontent.com/curl/curl/curl-7_53_0/lib/mk-ca-bundle.pl perl mk-ca-bundle.pl -k
export SSL_CERT_FILE=`pwd`/ca-bundle.crt rm $HOME/.curlrc
export LDFLAGS="-L/usr/local/lib/" export LD_LIBRARY_PATH="/usr/local/lib/" export CPPFLAGS="-I/usr/local/include -I/usr/local/include/openssl"
#Get source wget http://www.python.org/ftp/python/2.7.15/Python-2.7.15.tar.xz tar -xvf Python-2.7.15.tar.xz cd Python-2.7.15
#Apply patch to fix test_regrtest #wget https://github.com/python/cpython/pull/3912/commits/ab35adc682ec51800aa19a77de9947c6aaa50f41.diff #cat ab35adc682ec51800aa19a77de9947c6aaa50f41.diff | patch -p1
#Build and test ./configure --prefix=/usr/local --exec-prefix=/usr/local make make test 2>&1 | tee testlog
#Store failed tests grep "test test.*failed" testlog | cut -d" " -f2-2 | uniq >failures
#Store tests expected to fail and intermittent tests echo "test_gdb test_ssl test_gdb test_ssl " >expected
#Diff between expected and actual failures diff -u --ignore-all-space expected failures | tee diff_
#Fail if any extra test failed apart from expected if grep -q '+test' diff_; then exit 1 fi
#Run intermittent tests individually #cd ./Lib/test #../../python -m unittest test_ssl
#Install #cd ../../ #./python Lib/test/regrtest.py -v test_ssl #./python Lib/test/regrtest.py -v test_gdb sudo make install python_version=$(python --version 2>&1)
echo $python_version > output.txt
echo 'Python 2.7.14' > expected.txt result=`diff output.txt expected.txt`
if [ -z "$result" ] ; then exit 0 else exit 1 fi
